description: This trifle is perfect for a holiday dessert.
name: White Chocolate & Cherry Trifle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the trifle however you like in a large bowl or small individual cups. Layer the pound cake cubes brushed with some cherry syrup, whipped cream, cherry jam, drained cherries and grated white chocolate.
